00019 class NodeManagerException:public std::runtime_error{
00020 public:
00021         inline NodeManagerException(std::string message, int node_id):
00022         std::runtime_error(generateMessage(message, node_id).c_str()){}
00023 
00024 private:
00025         inline std::string generateMessage(std::string& message, int node_id){
00026                 std::stringstream output;
00027                 output<<message<<":"<<node_id;
00028                 return output.str();
00029         }
00030 };

00035 class NoMatchingNodeId:public NodeManagerException{
00036 public:
00041         NoMatchingNodeId(int node_id):NodeManagerException("node_id does not exist", node_id){};
00042 };
00043 
00047 class NonUniqueNodeName:public NodeManagerException{
00048 public:
00049         NonUniqueNodeName(std::string name):NodeManagerException(generateMessage(name), -1){};
00050 private:
00051         std::string generateMessage(std::string& name){
00052                 std::stringstream output;
00053                 output<<name<<" is not unique";
00054                 return output.str();
00055         }
00056 };
